articles.title: ‘Quad God’ Ilia Malinin leads after near-perfect short program
articles.description:
The two-time reigning world champion opened with a big quad flip Tuesday night, landed a perfect triple axel — perhaps saving the quad axel only he has ever landed for the free skate — and a quad lutz-triple toe loop that scored more than 22 points by itself.

The post ‘Quad God’ Ilia Malinin leads after near-perfect short program appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Kendrick Perkins explained why the Celtics are ‘the most dangerous team in the NBA’
articles.description:
"If I had to vote today, Jaylen Brown gets my vote for MVP."

The post Kendrick Perkins explained why the Celtics are ‘the most dangerous team in the NBA’ appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Norwegian biathlete’s ex-girlfriend responds after post-race cheating confession
articles.description:
"I didn’t choose to be put in this position, and it’s painful to have to endure it."

articles.title: Vermont’s Ryan Cochran-Siegle wins silver medal in Olympic super-G, Franjo von Allmen takes third gold
articles.description:
“Must be something in the water back home in Vermont,” Cochran-Siegle cracked. “It's crazy that we're sitting here with another successful Olympics.”

The post Vermont’s Ryan Cochran-Siegle wins silver medal in Olympic super-G, Franjo von Allmen takes third gold appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Team USA dominates women’s hockey rival Canada, shutting out Poulin-less squad to win group
articles.description:
The Americans, who have outscored and outshot their opponents by huge margins for four games, landed their first regulation Olympic win over the Canadians since 1998 — when they did it twice.

The post Team USA dominates women’s hockey rival Canada, shutting out Poulin-less squad to win group appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Catching up with Tenley Albright 70 years after her figure skating gold medal at the 1956 Cortina Olympics
articles.description:
“I can’t help feeling that I’m skating every edge with the skaters as they’re competing because the memories just flood your brain."

articles.title: Cam Newton reverses course with his comments on Drake Maye after Super Bowl loss

articles.title: Patriots CB Carlton Davis shares his pitch to free agents ahead of busy offseason

articles.title: Super Bowl averages 124.9 million US viewers, Bad Bunny’s halftime 128.2 million, both short of records
articles.description:
Seattle's 29-13 victory over New England averaged 124.9 million viewers on NBC, Peacock, Telemundo, NBC Sports Digital, and NFL+, according to Nielsen's Big Data + Panel rating system.

The post Super Bowl averages 124.9 million US viewers, Bad Bunny’s halftime 128.2 million, both short of records appeared first on Boston.com.
